mapper.select: SELECT 0 AS id , '' AS buyerId , a.CLASSES_CODE AS classesCode , a.MACHINING_CODE AS machiningCode , a.BREED_CODE AS breedCode , a.STANDARD_ID AS standardId , b.SFT_STD_ITEM_ID AS sftStdItemId , c.SFT_STD_ITEM_NAME AS sftStdItemName , b.SFT_OK_VAL AS okVal , '0' AS okValAgree , b.SFT_NG_VAL AS ngVal , '' AS description , b.REMARK AS remark , '0' AS isResearch FROM pd_standard a INNER JOIN pd_sft_std b ON b.STANDARD_ID = a.STANDARD_ID AND b.DEL_FLG = a.DEL_FLG INNER JOIN pd_sft_std_item c ON c.SFT_STD_ITEM_ID = b.SFT_STD_ITEM_ID AND c.IS_CATALOG = '1' AND c.DEL_FLG = b.DEL_FLG WHERE a.CLASSES_CODE = #{filterMap.classesCode} AND a.MACHINING_CODE = #{filterMap.machiningCode} AND a.BREED_CODE = #{filterMap.breedCode} AND a.CLASSESTREE_CODE = #{filterMap.treeCode}

SELECT ID AS id , BUYER_ID AS buyerId , CLASSES_CODE AS classesCode , MACHINING_CODE AS machiningCode , BREED_CODE AS breedCode , STANDARD_ID AS standardId , SFT_STD_ITEM_ID AS sftStdItemId , SFT_STD_ITEM_NAME AS sftStdItemName , OK_VAL AS okVal , OK_VAL_AGREE AS okValAgree , NG_VAL AS ngVal , DESCRIPTION AS description , REMARK AS remark , IS_RESEARCH AS isResearch FROM by_research_std_sft WHERE BUYER_ID = #{filterMap.buyerId} AND STANDARD_ID = #{filterMap.standardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO by_research_std_sft ( ID, BUYER_ID, CLASSES_CODE, MACHINING_CODE, BREED_CODE, STANDARD_ID, SFT_STD_ITEM_ID, SFT_STD_ITEM_NAME, OK_VAL, OK_VAL_AGREE, NG_VAL, DESCRIPTION, REMARK, IS_RESEARCH, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME, VER ) SELECT @rownum:=@rownum + 1 + a.maxId as id , #{buyerId} AS buyerId , #{classesCode} AS classesCode , #{machiningCode} AS machiningCode , #{breedCode} AS breedCode , #{standardId} AS standardId , a.SFT_STD_ITEM_ID AS sftStdItemId , a.SFT_STD_ITEM_NAME AS sftStdItemName , a.SFT_OK_VAL AS okVal , '0' AS okValAgree , a.SFT_NG_VAL AS ngVal , '' AS description , a.REMARK AS remark , '0' AS isResearch , #{delFlg} , #{updId} , #{updTime} , #{updId} , #{updTime} , #{updId} , #{updTime} , #{ver} FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=0 AS rowNum , (SELECT ifnull(MAX(ID), 0) FROM by_research_std_sft) AS maxId , std.SFT_STD_ITEM_ID , item.SFT_STD_ITEM_NAME , std.SFT_OK_VAL , std.SFT_NG_VAL , std.REMARK FROM pd_sft_std std INNER JOIN pd_sft_std_item item ON std.SFT_STD_ITEM_ID = item.SFT_STD_ITEM_ID AND item.IS_CATALOG = '1' AND item.DEL_FLG = std.DEL_FLG WHERE std.STANDARD_ID = #{standardId} AND std.DEL_FLG = '0' ORDER BY std.SFT_STD_ITEM_ID) a
